summary: Re-texture of the Glass weapon set, and makes the glass part transparent.
descriptionHtml:
AjuntaPall316\'s Glass Weapons

TO INSTALL:
Drag the \"DATA\" to the games installation directory.  ie: C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
Overwrite where necessary.


TO Uninstall: Delete the specific files out of your Data folder.


If you do not want transparent items don\'t copy the Meshes folder, just copy the Textures folder.  

Don\'t forget:
AjuntaPall316\'s Glass Armor Mod
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2212


Hope you enjoy.

AjuntaPall316


Comments don\'t seem to be working at the moment despite them being turned on.  Why?  I don\'t know, ask the moderators... If there is an issue with my mod please leave a comment at my Glass armor mod, or PM me.
author: AjuntaPall316
